WorkItem.Description:
Hi, I am now looking at the source code of the UriQuery (http://goo.gl/K1x9B) and I find out that its indexer (that takes a string key argument) compares using ordinal string comparer.
I don't understand why what anyone want a case sensitive search in the uri query? This should have been OridinalIgnoreCase.
WorkItem.Summary: UriQuery indexer is case sensitive, is that necessary?

Comments.Message:
Hi,

In my opinion this is a reasonable suggestion. 
We are leaving this work item open so the team can take it into account for future releases.

Thanks for your feedback.

Agustin Adami
http://blogs.southworks.net/aadami
